resources.title: National Portal of India - Agriculture
resources.description: A comprehensive website featuring information and resources on various aspects of agriculture in India, including crop production, soil health, irrigation, and more.

resources.title: Indian Council of Agricultural Research
resources.description: A national organization responsible for coordinating and promoting research in agriculture and allied fields in India.

resources.title: Krishi Vigyan Kendras
resources.description: A network of agricultural science centers spread across India, providing information and assistance to farmers and rural communities on a variety of topics.
